UTX,Pratt sees 2.5 percent or more cost cut on next F-35 engines NATIONAL HARBOR, Maryland Pratt & Whitney, a unit of United Technologies Corp , on Monday said it expects to drive down the cost of the F135 engines it builds for the U.S. F-35 fighter jet at least 2.5 percent, and perhaps more, in its next two production contracts. ~
